content:
/>
X.ii.4.B.2.b
.
Action to Take if a Veteran Expresses Disagreement Before VA Makes a Final Decision
Follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 3.B.2.b
, if a Veteran expresses disagreement with or requests decision review of a proposed action before VA makes a final decision.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B - Authorization for Reductions in Disability Evaluations Under 38 CFR 3.105(e)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B
